title: It’s Official: The Leap Second Will Be Retired (a Decade from Now)
description: On Friday, an international vote was taken to ditch the leap second, a technical fudge that has caused headaches since its inception 50 years ago.

title: Leg Booty? Panoramic? Seggs? How TikTok Is Changing Language
description: A new vocabulary — a little fun, a little dystopian — has emerged on the social video platform, as creators try to get around algorithms and strict content moderation. They call it algospeak.
